item.description: Spanakopita looks cheesy and delicious Anita!

item.description: You have a lovely blog. Just discovered it. Will be visiting more often!

MMMMMMMMMMMMMMMM,...I love dishas as yummie as this!!

item.content:encoded:
MMMMMMMMMMMMMMMM,…I love dishas as yummie as this!!

item.title: By: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.dc:creator: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.description: awww that looks great! The other night Alex Perry cooked this on masterchef...hmmm, but yours looks more flaky and more delicious! I Love LOVE LOVE spinach, so this recipe is perfect for me!
item.content:encoded: awww that looks great! The other night Alex Perry cooked this on masterchef…hmmm, but yours looks more flaky and more delicious! I Love LOVE LOVE spinach, so this recipe is perfect for me!

item.title: By: Cakelaw
item.dc:creator: Cakelaw
item.description: I didn't know that you could buy fresh filo - I have always used the frozen stuff, which as you mention is a pain because it sticks and tears and is generally cantankerous. This looks delicious - I love this dish.
item.content:encoded: I didn’t know that you could buy fresh filo – I have always used the frozen stuff, which as you mention is a pain because it sticks and tears and is generally cantankerous. This looks delicious – I love this dish.

item.title: By: Alexandra@Chefspiration
item.dc:creator: Alexandra@Chefspiration
item.description: Anything with pastry, spinach and cheese is a winner in my books! I gave you an award btw :) http://www.chefspiration.com/2009/10/blog-love.html
item.content:encoded: Anything with pastry, spinach and cheese is a winner in my books! I gave you an award btw ðŸ™‚ http://www.chefspiration.com/2009/10/blog-love.html

item.title: By: Trissa
item.dc:creator: Trissa
item.description: I've never tried to make these before - I always thought that the pastry was too fiddly as you mentioned but it looks like it came out alright!
item.content:encoded: I’ve never tried to make these before – I always thought that the pastry was too fiddly as you mentioned but it looks like it came out alright!

item.title: By: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.dc:creator: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.description: That sounds wonderful! I love spinach and cheese, and a combination of fetta and ricotta sounds extra tasty.
item.content:encoded: That sounds wonderful! I love spinach and cheese, and a combination of fetta and ricotta sounds extra tasty.

item.title: By: Rilsta
item.dc:creator: Rilsta
item.description: Yum! The first pic looks so good! I have always had them individually wrapped, but it as one whole baking dish is a fantastic idea and it looks just as yummy!
item.content:encoded: Yum! The first pic looks so good! I have always had them individually wrapped, but it as one whole baking dish is a fantastic idea and it looks just as yummy!

item.title: By: Juliana
item.dc:creator: Juliana
item.description: Oh! This looks delicious...spinach and feta cheese...I had these in small size. Never thought in making it this way...great idea. The pictures are very tempting :-)
item.content:encoded: Oh! This looks delicious…spinach and feta cheese…I had these in small size. Never thought in making it this way…great idea. The pictures are very tempting ðŸ™‚
